articles.title: MAS' Ravi Menon Calls Cryptocurrencies a Failure, Backs CBDCs and Stablecoins - CoinDesk
articles.description: Ravi Menon, the Managing Director of the Monetary Authority of Singapore, said crypto has performed poorly as a medium of exchange or store of value.
articles.content: Stablecoins and central bank digital currencies (CBDCs), not crypto, will be part of the financial ecosystem in the future, the managing director of Singapore's central bank said during his keynote a… [+2737 chars]

articles.content:
